description.value:
Hired to Capture or Kill a target. Success is determined based on the Degrees of Success on the Requisition/Acquisition Test exceeding the target's Threat Level or Influence Bonus (Whichever is higher).

Requirements

A Hired Hunter to track down and capture or kill a target of the hirer's choosing,

Effect: Average

Notes: -
